root.description:
Default abilities for this actor. These are granted when the actor spawns.
- Deprecated: Startup Abilities, Attributes and Effects are being deprecated and redundant with new MGCAbilitySystemComponent which includes support for granting those.
- If you are using the new Modular Actors introduced with 3.0.0 for 4.27, make sure to use the Ability System Component available on those actors to grant Abilities, Attributes and Effects and ignore this section.

param.name: Startup Abilities
param.type: Array of Gameplay Ability Class References
Array of Gameplay Ability Class References
